title: Help me ID this font
content:
Help me ID this font please! :)

Thanks!

Font: 

 Vtks Desgaste 

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [WANTED2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002815/http:/typophile.com/files/WANTED2.jpg) | 505.28 KB |
author: Jizzy

comments.content: The outlines look like **[Vtks Desgaste](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405002815/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Vtks%20Desgaste%20-%20Regular&fid=b37f0357d831597fdbfe3c71858ea7ae&fsize=60&text=WAN&fit=1)** by Douglas Vitkauskas [2007, Free for personal use], but your sample has different "scratch patterns"
